root: ^A cake with a candle on it.

c-0: ^Backwards and backwards, undoing every mistake, until the world, like puzzles falling into place, deliver your victory.
c-1: ^Eyes open, eyes closed, you march on and give no pause. Ironic, isn't it, that you have all of eternity to fall the obelisk, but not a single moment to breathe.
c-2: ^Restarting and rewinding. Your determined eyes and the pitched Obelisk make two mirrors that form an endless hall. Shatter the obelisk, and time will finally flow past its fateful edge.
